trans-unit.source: The <see cref="N:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior" /> namespace contains classes for creating custom user interface behavior for components at design time.
trans-unit.target: O namespace <see cref="N:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior" /> contém classes para criar o comportamento de interface do usuário personalizada para componentes em tempo de design.

trans-unit.source: The following list shows the classes included in this namespace:
trans-unit.target: A lista a seguir mostra as classes incluídas nesse namespace:

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph> class for handling painting and hit-testing.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph> classe para manipular a pintura e teste de clique.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Adorner> class for managing a collection of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph> objects.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Adorner> classe para gerenciar uma coleção de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph> objetos.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService> class for managing the custom user interface in a designer.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService> classe para gerenciar a interface de usuário personalizada em um designer.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.SnapLine> class that represents horizontal and vertical line segments that assist users in aligning components at design time.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.SnapLine> a classe que representa os segmentos de linha horizontal e vertical que ajudam os usuários Alinhando componentes em tempo de design.
